name: Follow
description:
“The Way, the Truth, the Life”. As quite a precocious child, I often questioned what it meant. Told myself, maybe when I'm older, I'd understand. And when I began to, I'd considered it the best knowledge acquired so far.

Our own path is unique to us. Nobody on earth knows it better than you do. 
“Your life is a verse of God’s own writing with grief and groaning and glory that even the most eloquent words will not be able to express.”

“Follow Me, and I will make you” (Isaiah 41:14-15)
